item.title: Meet - "Creating a Portfolio with GitHub Pages"
item.description:
Meet - Web Development for Everyone

This session delves into a useful additional service Github offers, called Github Pages. This is open for all, and we especially welcome non-technical people!

Prerequisites: Please complete your Github Profile Setup and ensure you are able to log into it prior to the event. Refer to this guide for step-by-step instructions on how to do this: https://blog.neotechclub.qzz.io/p/git-workshop-1-level-1-making-a-github-account-route-a-github/

We will walk participants through static web pages, the deployment process, interesting things that can be done with this and most importantly, show you how you can get started :D

  • Venue: üó∫ (Room 202) Sem-5 BCA Classroom, GCC
  • Time: ‚è≤ (TO-BE-ANNOUNCED) -> November 20th 2025
  • (with a buffer of 15 minutes for initial setup)

Links:

  • Presentation Slides: https://w4-site-slides.neotechclub.qzz.io
